abstract: Ken Belson On Pro Football column speculates on possible outcome of New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady's appeal of four-game suspension; notes legal experts believe Federal District Court Judge Richard M Berman will rule that NFL commissioner Roger Goodell acted within his authority, unless two sides reach settlement.
lead_paragraph: Prognosticators are wondering what Judge Richard M. Berman of Federal District Court in Manhattan will do on Monday in the showdown between Tom Brady and the N.F.L.

headline.main: It’s Hard to Foretell a Brady Ruling, if There Is One
headline.print_headline: It’s Hard to Foretell a Brady Ruling, if There Is One

snippet: Prognosticators are wondering what Judge Richard M. Berman of Federal District Court in Manhattan will do on Monday in the showdown between Tom Brady and the N.F.L.
